text: int main ( ) { long int t , n , i ; scanf ( "%ld" , & t ) ; if ( t <= 5 ) { for ( i = 1 ; i <= t ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%ld" , & n ) ; printf ( "%ld\n" , calc ( n ) ) ; } } return 0 ; } int calc ( long int n ) { long int a [ n ] , i , c = n ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%ld" , & a [ i ] ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n - 1 ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] <= a [ i + 1 ] ) c ++ ; } return c ; }

int calc ( long int n ) { long int a [ n ] , i , c = n ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%ld" , & a [ i ] ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n - 1 ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] <= a [ i + 1 ] ) c ++ ; } return c ; }
